All Implemented Interfaces:

extends SyncHook

Field Detail

running

private boolean running
Determines whether the statistics measuring is in progress

threshold

private int threshold
The procentual bussiness to start cleaning

minLoops

private int minLoops
Minimum number of loops between two cleanings

loopCounter

private int loopCounter
Counter of overloaded loops from the last cleaning. This counter is used only in case of nonzero minLoops. If we are not currently counting overloaded loops, it is set to minLoop, not to delay the cleaning.

cWindow

private long[] cWindow
The window measuring time not spent by computing of the simulation in each iteration, used for cleanup. The window is used as a cyclic buffer.

cWindowFirst

private int cWindowFirst
The first member of the cWindow cyclic buffer

cWindowLen

private int cWindowLen
Length of the measured cWindow

cSleepingTime

private long cSleepingTime
Time spent by sleeping in the last cWindow

cWindowTime

private long cWindowTime
Scheduling time for one cWindow turnaround

vWindow

private long[] vWindow
The window measuring time not spent by computing of the simulation in each iteration, used for viewing. The window is used as a cyclic buffer.

vWindowFirst

private int vWindowFirst
The first member of the vWindow cyclic buffer

vWindowLen

private int vWindowLen
Length of the measured vWindow

vSleepingTime

private long vSleepingTime
Time spent by sleeping in the last vWindow

vWindowTime

private long vWindowTime
Scheduling time for one vWindow turnaround

loopTime

private long loopTime
Scheduling time for one scheduling loop

currentLoad

private int currentLoad
Current load

timePenalty

private long timePenalty
The time overload above loopTime in previous steps

cleaningEnabled

private boolean cleaningEnabled
Determines whether the cleaning is enabled

init

private boolean init
Determines whether we are int initializing phase.

initCounter

private int initCounter
Counter of frames of the init phase.

Constructor Detail

SchedulingStatisticsImpl

public SchedulingStatisticsImpl(int threshold,
                                int windowLen,
                                int minLoops,
                                long loopTime)
Create a new instance of Statistics

Parameters:
threshold - Percentage of bussiness to start cleaning
windowLen - Number of scheduling loops to consider. Longer windowLen means slower reaction, but better stability in local boosts
minLoops - Minimum loops between two cleanings if the threshold is permanently overshooted
loopTime - Time of one scheduling loop

minLoops - Minimum loops between two cleanings if the threshold is permanently overshooted
loopTime - Time of one scheduling loop
